content.rendered:
Dr Saeed Dehnadi has extensive experience in software developments and works for QA Ltd as a Learning Consultant since 2012. QA Ltd is one of the well reputed IT related training providers that delivers educational programs amongst a broad spectrum of the UK’s software industry in a variety of levels. Dehnadi delivers courses in the Apprenticeship Programs, work-based higher education programs as well as bespoke training programs for the software industry’s IT professionals.

Dehnadi has also worked for Bolton University/Regent HE College Partnership as a Guest Lecturer for the Data Structures and Algorithms course since 2020.

Dehnadi’s research interest is Cognitive Study in the early learning of programming. He realised that a considerable number of failures and withdrawals from introduction to programming courses is a global dilemma for computer science departments. He became interested in looking at novices’ ability to learn programming in the early stages of their further/higher education. His study in this area rewarded him a PhD in 2010.

Dehnadi worked for Middlesex University for 10 years as Research Tutor, taught Object-oriented programming and design, System developments and tools/application for web developments.

Dehnadi has 10 years of experience working as a Programming Senior Developer in a variety of software houses in UK and Sweden.

Dehnadi had also obtained a MSc (Interactive Computer Systems) from Middlesex University and a BSc (Hons) from Southbank University in Computer Studies.

Course taught

SWE5102 Data Structures and Algorithms
